#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,i;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
       	string l,k;
        cin>>l>>k;
        for(i=0;i<k.length();i++)
        {
        	if(k[i] != l[i])
         	break;
        }
        for(;i<k.length();i++)
        {
        	if(k[i] != l[i+1])
             break;
        }
        if(i ==k.length())
        cout<<"1"<<endl;
        else
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }
}
